name: multi-simulation-risk-engine
description: Multi-Language Risk Simulation Engine with Node.js and Python backends

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend/node && npm install && cd ../python && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run start-node" "npm run start-python" "npm run start-gateway"
scripts.dev-python: cd backend/python && set FLASK_DEBUG=true && python app.py
scripts.dev-all: concurrently "npm run dev-node" "npm run dev-python" "npm run dev-gateway"
scripts.test-all: npm run test-node && npm run test-python

author: Multi-Language Risk Engine Team
